source:
%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_involvement_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.casereference IS NULL
        THEN T1.CaseInvolvementID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                 AS CaseInvolvementID, -- surrogate key
    T3.id                               AS ContactID,
    T3.casereference                    AS CaseReference,
    T3.sourcesuid                       AS SUAreaID,
    T3.salutation                       AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname                        AS FirstName, 
    T3.lastname                         AS LastName,
    T3.addressline1                     AS AddressLine1,
    T3.addressline2                     AS AddressLine2,
    T3.addresstown                      AS AddressTown,
    T3.addresscounty                    AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode                         AS Postcode,
    'United Kingdom'                    AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisation                     AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtype                 AS OrganisationType,
    T3.serviceusertype                  AS ServiceUserType,
    T3.role                             AS Role,
    T3.telephonenumber                  AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.otherphonenumber                 AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.faxnumber                        AS FaxNumber,
    T3.emailaddress                     AS EmailAddress,
    '1'                                 AS Migrated,
    T3.sourcesystem                     AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID                   AS SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    to_timestamp(T3.ingested_datetime)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T3.casereference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.id, '.'),
            IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.emailaddress,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.organisation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.serviceusertype,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T1.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON T1.SourceSystemID = T2.SourceSystemID
FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.service_user T3 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T3.casereference
        AND T1.ContactID = T3.id
        AND T1.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.casereference = T1.CaseReference 
            AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T3.casereference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.id, '.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.emailaddress,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.organisation,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.serviceusertype,'.')
                )) <> T1.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    )
    AND T3.casereference IS NOT NULL
    AND T3.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.service_user)
;

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW casework_case_involvement_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select
    CaseInvolvementID,
    ContactID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From casework_case_involvement_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    CaseInvolvementID,
    ContactID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim T1
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casework_case_involvement_dim_new WHERE CaseInvolvementID IS NULL) 
    AND ContactID IN (SELECT ContactID FROM casework_case_involvement_dim_new WHERE CaseReference = T1.CaseReference AND CaseReference IS NULL)
    AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_case_involvement_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_involvement_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    CaseInvolvementID,
    ContactID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_case_involvement_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim AS Target
USING casework_case_involvement_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.CaseInvolvementID = Target.CaseInvolvementID

-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (CaseInvolvementID,
        ContactID,
        CaseReference,
        SUAreaID,
        Salutation,
        FirstName,
        LastName,
        AddressLine1,
        AddressLine2,
        AddressTown,
        AddressCounty,
        Postcode,
        AddressCountry,
        Organisation,
        OrganisationType,
        ServiceUserType,
        Role,
        TelephoneNumber,
        OtherPhoneNumber,
        FaxNumber,
        EmailAddress,
        Migrated,
        ODTSourceSystem,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.CaseInvolvementID,
        Source.ContactID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.SUAreaID,
        Source.Salutation,
        Source.FirstName,
        Source.LastName,
        Source.AddressLine1,
        Source.AddressLine2,
        Source.AddressTown,
        Source.AddressCounty,
        Source.Postcode,
        Source.AddressCountry,
        Source.Organisation,
        Source.OrganisationType,
        Source.ServiceUserType,
        Source.Role,
        Source.TelephoneNumber,
        Source.OtherPhoneNumber,
        Source.FaxNumber,
        Source.EmailAddress,
        Source.Migrated,
        Source.ODTSourceSystem,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive)

%%sql
-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CaseInvolvementID NULLS LAST) AS CaseInvolvementID,
    ContactID,
    CaseReference,
    SUAreaID,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    ServiceUserType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim;
